UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Functional characterisation of the 1-18 fragment of esculentin-1b, an antimicrobial peptide from Rana esculenta.
Literature.Author: Mangoni ML, Fiocco D, Mignogna G, Barra D, Simmaco M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli D21(LC=0.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15692(LC=1.4µM),Yersinia pseudotuberculosis YPIII(LC=0.1µM),Pseudomonas syringae pv. tabaci(LC=0.3µM),Pantoea agglomerans Bo-1S(LC=0.3µM),Bacillus megaterium Bm11(LC=0.3µM),Staphylococcus aureus Cowan 1(LC=0.4µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(LC=0.4µM),Phytophthora nicotianae(MIC=>75µM),Phytophthora nicotianae(MFC=>75µM),Phytophthora nicotianae(LC50=20µM)
